page.title: 16GREENHEYS YOUTH CLUB IN L/H
page.content: { Mrs Dorothy Thornton}has been the youth club leader at Greenheys youth club for 5 years. The club was{ {founded about 20 years ago}by Salford Education authority who still finance it today. The club is open three nights a week : one night for juniors (aged 10-13),one night for seniors (13-17) and one night for both. {Juniors pay}15 pence membership and 5 pence per night. {Facilities offered at the club include- disco dancing, table tennis, pool, table football and a shop. Also there are football and rounders teams. There are 135 members, about 36 attend each evening and there are 5 paid staff. Mrs Thornton thinks highly of her members and{hopes that in the future} this successful club will be provided with new premises so that more can be offered the young of Little Hulton.
